name: white-label
description: A Vinyl-Trading enterprise app built with Node.js + TypeScript using Domain-Driven Design

scripts.db:flush:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run db:delete:dev && npm run db:create:dev
scripts.db:flush:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run db:delete:test && npm run db:create:test
scripts.migrate:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development dotenv -e .env sequelize db:migrate
scripts.migrate:test: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=test dotenv -e .env sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.migrate:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env sequelize db:migrate --env production

author: Khalil Stemmler
